text:
I added the following to server.xml, still I am not able to use sym links. Is 
there some issue with 5.0.24. I remember a similar issue with 5.0.17 earlier.
(u can refer bug # 25593)
creator: maheshk@amazon.com
yoavs@computer.org
text:
You added what to server.xml?  There's nothing "following" your first 
paragraph.  Try 5.0.27 and update your bug report if it still fails in 5.0.27.

The following was added in server.xml
<Context path="/myApp" docBase="myApp" debug="0"
                 reloadable="true" crossContext="true">
<Resources className="org.apache.naming.resources.FileDirContext"
	              allowLinking="true" />
</Context>

Still symlink was not possible. If there is no prob with 5.0.24, could it be 
because I have installed Tomcat as root on my linux desktop?

Regards
Mahesh
creator: maheshk@amazon.com

text:
For Tomcat 5, you should use the Context attribute "allowLinking" rather than 
the Tomcat 4 Resources element.  See the Context configuration reference page 
for more information.
creator: yoavs@computer.org
